comment._content: nla.gov.au/nla.news-article16363602 the digitised newspapers indicate that in 1927 a W.G. McGrath played banjo solos on Sydney radio station 2FC on various occasions...here he's listed at 8.04 and 8.32 in the evening...maybe he was an aspiring artist...can't find any pics of him on Trove alas...he's a 'possible'
